snippet.title: Antonblast - Official Animated Intro Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description: Here's a peek at the hand-animated intro for Antonblast in this latest trailer for the action platformer game that's all about destruction. Antonblast will be available on Nintendo Switch and PC on November 12, 2024, and a demo is available now. Play as the enraged Dynamite Anton (or his cranked-out coworker Annie) and use your Mighty F’n Hammer to demolish bizarre worlds, tussle with screen-filling bosses, and steal your Spirits back from Satan.
